Costa de la Luz - Where are the nicest beaches?
Located in the heart of the Costa de la Luz, this Adults Only hotel is 80 km from the airport of Faro in Portugal, and 140 km from Seville Airport.
Active on the Costa de la Luz since 1998 (in Spain since 1986)
